credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: Pacernik Potiomkin [Battleship Potiomkin]
provenance: Acquired from dealers, galleries and auction houses by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
description:
Solarised, abstract, black-and-white photograph of people running down wide stairs, with a red vertical bar at upper left, and a red "spill" at lower center. 
Inscriptions: the title "PANCERNIK / POTIOMKIN" at upper right, at upper left: "slynny bunt / marynarzy / w wielkim filmie / SERGIUSZA / EISENSTEINA", at upper center: "Produkcja "GOSKINO" / WYCONAWCY: A. Antonow / W. Barski / G. Aleksandrow".
name: Poster
